original: intros x. unfold filterlim, filter_le, Rbar_locally, Rbar_opp. intros P H. destruct x. - intros A H1. apply H. eapply locally_singleton. auto. - destruct P as [M H1]. exists M. intros y H2. apply H. exists y. apply H1. apply H2. - destruct P as [M H1]. exists M. intros y H2. apply H. exists y. apply H1. apply H2.
